{"id":554154279,"lang":"cpp","time":"6Â months","timestamp":1631530683,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"4 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/554154279/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Add Strings","memory":"6.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    string addStrings(string num1, string num2) {\n        string ans=\"\";\n        int i=num1.size()-1,j=num2.size()-1,c=0;\n        while(i>=0 && j>=0){\n            int s=num1[i]+num2[j]+c-2*'0';\n            if(s>9) c=1;\n            else c=0;\n            ans.push_back(s%10+'0');\n            i--;j--;\n        }\n        while(i>=0){\n            int s=num1[i]+c-'0';\n            if(s>9) c=1;\n            else c=0;\n            ans.push_back(s%10+'0');\n            i--;\n        }\n        while(j>=0){\n            int s=num2[j]+c-'0';\n            if(s>9) c=1;\n            else c=0;\n            ans.push_back(s%10+'0');\n            j--;\n        }\n        if(c)ans+=\"1\";\n        reverse(ans.begin(),ans.end());\n        return ans;        \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"add-strings"}
